channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Cybernetix Ventures raising $100M fund for robotics and physical AI
item.description: Cybernetix Ventures is launching its second fund to invest in robotics startups developing systems for industries such as construction. The post Cyber...

item.title: Pony.ai partners with Xihu to deploy 1k robotaxis in Shenzhen
item.description: Pony.ai has plans to expand its Chinese deployments, and establish services in Europe and the Middle East this year. The post Pony.ai partners with Xi...

item.title: I help my elderly mother every day and drive her to appointments. Can I recoup my costs from her estate?
item.description: “I don’t want to upset her while she’s living. Stress makes her condition worse.”

item.title: Job openings rise in middle of trade wars, but businesses are slower to hire
Car and chipmakers form group to develop open in-car connectivity
item.description: Automotive car makers, suppliers, semiconductor manufacturers and ecosystem partners announced the formation of the OpenGMSL Association.

item.title: ‘The situation is extreme’: I’m 65 and leaving my estate to only one grandchild. Can the others contest my will?
item.description: “I feel it is absolutely necessary to leave about 90% of what I have to just one grandchild.”

item.title: Don’t count on an inheritance: Baby boomers are hanging on to their money
item.description: How to tell your children you plan to “die with zero.”

item.title: What game companies can learn from AI analysis of 1.5M gamer conversations | Creativ Company
item.description: Creativ Company is emerging today as a new kind of market intelligence company. It uses AI to do do sentiment analysis.

item.title: Inside Intuit’s GenOS update: Why prompt optimization and intelligent data cognition are critical to enterprise agentic AI success
item.description: Intuit is using advanced genetic algorithms to help with prompt optimizations that could have significant impact for users.

item.title: America’s biggest lender is closing its wallet — and investors and homebuyers will feel it. Here’s what to watch.
item.description: Prepare for higher U.S. interest rates if Japan cuts its U.S. Treasury bond holdings. But there could be a silver lining.

item.title: Enterprise alert: PostgreSQL just became the database you can’t ignore for AI applications
item.description: Analysts provide insight on what the latest acquisition of a PostgreSQL database vendor means for enterprise data and AI.

item.title: CockroachDB’s distributed vector indexing tackles the looming AI data explosion enterprises aren’t ready for
item.description: Scaling distributed SQL queries needs more performance and efficiency in the agentic AI era. It’s a challenge Cockroach is looking to solve.
